entry.title: Turn Your Dumbbells Into Barbell Plates
entry.content:
Introducing Dumb2Bar ‚Äî a 3D-printable adapter that transforms your dumbbells into barbell plates.

No need to buy separate weight plates ‚Äî just reuse what you already own.

Print it. Bolt it. Lift.

üîó Get it on Cults3D: https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/various/dumbell-to-barbell-adapter

entry.title: 3D-Printed AprilTags That Withstand the Real World
entry.content:
In many robotics projects, AprilTags are indispensable. But the standard approach ‚Äî printing on paper, gluing to cardboard ‚Äî doesn‚Äôt hold up outside the lab. Tags peel, warp, fade, and disintegrate when exposed to handling, humidity, or rough environments.

Tracker3D.jl solves this. It generates 3D-printable AprilTags engineered for the real world: flat, durable, weather-resistant, and easy to integrate directly into enclosures or mounts. Whether you‚Äôre field-testing robots or deploying long-term vision systems, these tags won‚Äôt fail you.

Why Tracker3D.jl?

  • üö´ No more flimsy paper or fragile adhesives
  • ‚úÖ Always flat, robust, and easy to embed
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Weatherproof and reusable
  • üß© Ideal for industrial, outdoor, or educational setups

GitHub: willGuimont/Tracker3D.jl

Ready-to-print tags: Thingiverse

entry.title: Dumbbell to Barbell Adapter
entry.content:
This dumbbell-to-barbell adapter allows you to transform your dumbbells into barbell plates. Designed to fit on a standard barbell, this adapter ensures your dumbbells stay in place during even the most intense workouts. It‚Äôs a cost-effective, space-saving solution for those looking to expand their weightlifting capabilities without purchasing additional equipment.

The adapter fits on standard barbells with a diameter of 1‚Äú (25.4 mm) and is compatible with dumbbells that have a handle length of 6‚Äú (124 mm) or longer.

Available here: Dumbbell to Barbell Adapter @ cults3d.com
